original_text: By calling this covenant “new,” he has made the first one obsolete; and what is obsolete and outdated will soon disappear.
korean_text: 새 언약이라 말씀하셨으매 첫 것은 낡아지게 하신 것이니 낡아지고 쇠하는 것은 없어져 가는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: he has made the first one obsolete
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 첫 번째 언약을 낡게 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: and what is obsolete and outdated
